scripts.serve: concurrently "php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8000" "php artisan reverb:start --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8080" "php artisan queue:work --tries=3 --timeout=90 --sleep=3" --names "Laravel,Reverb,Queue" --prefix-colors "green,blue,yellow"
scripts.serve:dev: concurrently "php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8000" "php artisan reverb:start --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8080" "php artisan queue:work --tries=3 --timeout=90 --sleep=3" "vite" --names "Laravel,Reverb,Queue,Vite" --prefix-colors "green,blue,yellow,cyan"
